name: Q Railing
description:
Q-railing is known worldwide for its unique railing systems.

The design mantra of the company is: safety, simplicity, quality and the ability to be installed quickly and easily . Whether you are designing a public space or a private residence, the architectural details always have a significant impact on the end result. With Q-railing systems you can bring your vision to life.

product_images.title: Q-line Glass Frame Tube
product_images.description: Q-line Glass Frame Tube reduces your construction costs! It is a new quick-installation option for glass infill. Plus, because the glass panels are placed in front of – rather than in between – the baluster posts, longer lengths of glass can be used, which makes installation go even quicker.

product_images.title: Easy Glass® Evo
product_images.description: When you’re looking for space winning solutions, the fascia mount Easy Glass Evo System gives you what you need. After a slim start profile is mounted to the sides, the base shoe is easy to install. As with all Easy Glass railing systems, the glass is then mounted using our easy safety wedge installation system.

product_images.title: Q-lights
product_images.description:
The latest addition to Q-railing’s range of design railing systems. With Q-lights you can create atmosphere and add safety to your railings with low-voltage LED lights.

Q-lights is a complete system that includes everything you need to install a durable and long-lasting illuminated railing.

product_images.title: Easy Glass® Slim
product_images.description: An ideal choice for stairs, balconies and other railing installations.While its perfect finish allows for an open build, Easy Glass Slim can also be cladded with stainless steel. And, as with all of the Easy Glass base shoes, Q-railing’s safety wedge installation system ensures a safe connection from the glass to the base shoe every time.

product_images.title: Square Line®
product_images.description: A complete modular system, you can even combine components of the Square Line with components from other Q-railing systems. For example, mix square baluster posts with a round caprail. The possibilities are endless.

product_images.title: MOD 6000
product_images.description: MOD 6000 lets you create your own design by combining a distinctive base with your choice of Q-railing’s wide range of caprails. With no visable screws and a beautiful, seamless design, the MOD 6000 shows how once again, Q-railing sets the standard for the ultimate designs in glass railing systems.

product_images.title: Easy Glass 3KN
product_images.description:
Able to absorb a side force of 3kN to the glass without any problems, the strikingly attractive Easy Glass 3kN system meets worldwide safety and building regulations. 

Extremely robust and easy to assemble, the system comes with a choice of a perfect stainless steel finish on the base shoe or with stainless steel cladding. It’s a minimalist railing system that provides a maximum of strength and safety.

product_images.title: d line
product_images.description:
For many years, Danish designer Knud Holscher’s d line railing systems have been at the forefront of contemporary railing design. It has even been rewarded a Red Dot Award, the highest possible design appreciation worldwide.

Now that Q-railing has acquired the d line railing division, it will be reintroduced to the European market as part of Q-railing’s own range of railing systems. Original quality and design guaranteed! This reintroduction is planned for the first half of 2013.
